sense.def: Pathological Condition of mu yi 目翳 , eye shade, that is difficult to cure and continues for an extended period of time. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 33: 治眼久積頑翳蓋覆瞳仁，宜點朴硝散方 , “To cure eyes with a stubborn shade that has collected over an extended periodof time to cover the pupil, it is advisable [to use] the recipe to swab them with the powder containing pu xiao ”.
